attribute.name: font
attribute.description: The font reference for a StringItem, TextField, etc.

attribute.name: font-style
attribute.description: The font style of an item or screen element.
attribute.values: plain, default, normal, bold, italic, cursive, underlined, underline

attribute.name: font-size
attribute.description: The font size of an item or screen element.
attribute.values: small, little, medium, default, normal, large, big

attribute.name: font-face
attribute.description: The font face of an item or screen element.

attribute.name: font-color
attribute.description: The font color of an item or screen element.

attribute.name: focused-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the currently focused item, usually applied with a [style-name]:hover construct.

attribute.name: title-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the title of the corresponding Screen.

attribute.name: label-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the label of the corresponding Item.

attribute.name: columns
attribute.description: The number of columns. This can be used to layout the items in a table.

attribute.name: columns-width
attribute.description: Either "normal", "equal" or the width for each column in a comma separated list (e.g. "columns-width: 60,60,10").

attribute.name: icon-image
attribute.description: The URL of the image. The keyword %INDEX% can be used for adding the position of the icon to the name, e.g."icon-image: url(icon%INDEX%.png);".

attribute.name: icon-image-align
attribute.description: The position of the image relative to the text.

attribute.name: choice-color
attribute.description: The color in which the check- or radio-box will be painted.

attribute.name: checkbox-selected
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is multiple. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color.

attribute.name: checkbox-plain
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a not-selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is multiple. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color. When "none" is given, no image will be drawn for not-selected items. Only the image for selected items will be drawn in that case.

attribute.name: radiobox-selected
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is exclusive. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color.

attribute.name: radiobox-plain
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a not-selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is exclusive. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color. When "none" is given, no image will be drawn for not-selected items. Only the image for selected items will be drawn in that case.

attribute.name: popup-image
attribute.description: The URL to the image which should be shown in the closed popup-group. Per default a simple dropdown image will be used.

attribute.name: popup-color
attribute.description: The color for the arrow in the dropdown-image of a closed popup-group.

attribute.name: popup-background-color
attribute.description: The color for the background in the dropdown-image of a closed popup-group.

attribute.name: menubar-color
attribute.description: The color of the menu-bar. This overrides the settings in the predefined style "menu". This attribute is only used, when the "menu" fullscreen setting is activated in the "build.xml" file.

attribute.name: gauge-image
attribute.description: The URL of the image.

attribute.name: gauge-color
attribute.description: The color of the progress bar.

attribute.name: gauge-width
attribute.description: The width of the progress bar.

attribute.name: gauge-height
attribute.description: The height of the progress bar.

attribute.name: gauge-mode
attribute.description: In continuous mode only the gauge-color will be used, whereas the chunked mode intersects the indicator in chunks. The setting is ignored when an image is provided.

attribute.name: gauge-gap-color
attribute.description: The color of gaps between single chunks. Only used in the "chunked" gauge-mode or when a gauge with an indefinite range is used. In the latter case the provided color will be used to indicate the idle state.

attribute.name: gauge-gap-width
attribute.description: The width of gaps in pixels between single chunks. Only used in the "chunked" gauge-mode.

attribute.name: gauge-chunk-width
attribute.description: The width of single chunks in pixels. Only used in the "chunked" gauge-mode.

attribute.name: gauge-show-value
attribute.description: Determines whether the current value should be shown.

attribute.name: gauge-value-align
attribute.description: Defines where the current value of the gauge should be displayed.

attribute.name: textfield-width
attribute.description: The minimum width of the textfield-element in pixels. (deprecated)

attribute.name: textfield-height
attribute.description: The minimum height of the textfield-element in pixels. Defaults to the height of the used font. (deprecated)

attribute.name: textfield-direct-input
attribute.description: Defines whether input should be done with with J2ME Polish only instead of with the native input-system of the underlying OS.

attribute.name: textfield-caret-color
attribute.description: Defines the color of the caret. This defaults to the color of the text (font-color).

attribute.name: opacity
attribute.description: The opacity of an item between 0 (fully transparent) and 100% / 255 (fully opaque).

attribute.name: textfield-show-length
attribute.description: Defines whether the current length of the input should be shown.

attribute.name: datefield-width
attribute.description: The minimum width of the datefield-element in pixels. (deprecated)

attribute.name: datefield-height
attribute.description: The minimum height of the datefield-element in pixels. Defaults to the height of the used font. (deprecated)

attribute.name: ticker-step
attribute.description: The number of pixels by which the ticker is shifted at each update.

attribute.name: scrollindicator-color
attribute.description: The color of the item which indicates that the user can scroll the current screen. Is ignored when a scrollbar is used.

attribute.name: show-text-in-title
attribute.description: Defines whether a screen should show the text of the affected items in the title instead on the screen.

attribute.name: font-bitmap
attribute.description: Defines which bitmap (bmf) font should be used.

attribute.name: view-type
attribute.description: Defines another visualization for an Item or a Screen.

attribute.name: droppingview-repeat-animation
attribute.description: Defines whether the animation should be repeated each time the screen is shown.

attribute.name: droppingview-speed
attribute.description: Defines the speed in pixels per animation-step of the falling items.

attribute.name: droppingview-maximum
attribute.description: Defines the maximum bouncing height of the falling items.

attribute.name: droppingview-damping
attribute.description: The value by which the maximum is decreased for each following item. By having a damping, the top items seem to bounce higher than lower ones.

attribute.name: droppingview-maxperiode
attribute.description: The maximum allowed number of bounces.

attribute.name: shuffleview-repeat-animation
attribute.description: Defines whether the animation should be repeated each time the screen is shown.

attribute.name: shuffleview-speed
attribute.description: Defines the speed in pixels per animation-step of the items.

attribute.name: tabbar-scrolling-indicator-color
attribute.description: Defines the color of the scrolling indicator of the tabbar.

attribute.name: menubar-select-image
attribute.description: Defines the image-URL for the select-image of the extended menubar.

attribute.name: menubar-cancel-image
attribute.description: Defines the image-URL for the cancel-image of the extended menubar.

attribute.name: menubar-options-image
attribute.description: Defines the image-URL for the options-image of the extended menubar.

attribute.name: menubar-show-image-and-text
attribute.description: Determines whether the text should also be shown in the menubar, when an image has been defined for the corresponding action.

attribute.name: foreground-image
attribute.description: The url of the image that should be shown at the topmost layer. You can also set the foreground-x and foreground-y positions.

attribute.name: foreground-x
attribute.description: The x position of the foreground image.

attribute.name: foreground-y
attribute.description: The y position of the foreground image.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-arrow-color
attribute.description: The color of the arrows.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-right-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the right arrow image.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-left-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the left arrow image.

attribute.name: min-width
attribute.description: The minimum content width of an item.

attribute.name: max-width
attribute.description: The maximum content width of an item.

attribute.name: scale-factor
attribute.description: The factor in percent by which the image should be scaled, e.g. 200.

attribute.name: scale-steps
attribute.description: The number of intermediate steps that should be used for scaling an image.

attribute.name: screen-change-animation
attribute.description: An effect that should be shown whenever the screen is changed.

attribute.name: left-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: right-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: top-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: bottom-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: left-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: left-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the shutter.

attribute.name: right-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: right-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the shutter

attribute.name: top-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: top-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the shutter.

attribute.name: bottom-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: bottom-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the shutter.

attribute.name: flash-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: flash-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the shutter

attribute.name: vertical-flash-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation. By default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: vertical-flash-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the shutter

attribute.name: complete-background
attribute.description: A background name from the backgrounds section. The background includes the label of the item and is independent of the item's normal background.

attribute.name: textfield-caret-flash
attribute.description: Defines whether the cursor should blink.

attribute.name: icon-horizontal-adjustment
attribute.description: Adjusts the icon by the specified number of pixels horizontally. Negative values move the icon-image to the left.

attribute.name: icon-vertical-adjustment
attribute.description: Adjusts the icon by the specified number of pixels vertically. Negative values move the icon-image to the top.

attribute.name: text-horizontal-adjustment
attribute.description: Adjusts the text by the specified number of pixels horizontally. Negative values move the text to the left.

attribute.name: text-vertical-adjustment
attribute.description: Adjusts the text by the specified number of pixels vertically. Negative values move the text to the top.

attribute.name: scroll-mode
attribute.description: Enables or disables the smooth scrolling function.

attribute.name: cube-screen-change-animation-background-color
attribute.description: Sets the background of a cube screen change animation.

attribute.name: clip-screen-info
attribute.description: Enables or disables the clipping of the info-section. It is visible for TextFields in the direct input mode, for example.

attribute.name: text-effect
attribute.description: Sets a text effect.

attribute.name: text-shadow-color
attribute.description: Sets the color of a shadow for the shadow font-effect.

attribute.name: text-shadow-orientation
attribute.description: Sets the orientation of a shadow for the shadow font-effect.
attribute.values: bottom-right, bottom-left, top-right, top-left, bottom, top, right, left

attribute.name: text-shadow-x
attribute.description: Sets the x-orientation in pixels of a shadow for the shadow font-effect.

attribute.name: text-shadow-y
attribute.description: Sets the y-orientation in pixels of a shadow for the shadow font-effect.

attribute.name: text-outline-inner-color
attribute.description: The color with which the outline is filled inside. The outline itself will be painted in the specified font-color.

attribute.name: text-segment-color
attribute.description: The color of the lines used for separating the segments.

attribute.name: text-segment-gap
attribute.description: The gap between segment lines.

attribute.name: text-lighthouse-mode
attribute.description: Sets the mode of the lighthouse font-effect.
attribute.values: back-and-forth, left-to-right, right-to-left, back-and-forth-once, left-to-right-once, right-to-left-once

attribute.name: text-lighthouse-color
attribute.description: Sets the main color of the lighthouse font-effect.

attribute.name: text-lighthouse-neighbor-color
attribute.description: Sets the color for characters next to the currently main character in the lighthouse font-effect.

attribute.name: text-vertical-gradient-start-color
attribute.description: Sets the top color for the font gradient.

attribute.name: text-vertical-gradient-end-color
attribute.description: Sets the bottom color for the font gradient.

attribute.name: text-vertical-gradient-steps
attribute.description: Sets number of steps for the font gradient. This defaults to the height of the used font.

attribute.name: scrollindicator-up-image
attribute.description: The URL of the image indicating that the user can scroll upwards.

attribute.name: scrollindicator-down-image
attribute.description: The URL of the image indicating that the user can scroll downwards.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-arrow-position
attribute.description: The position of the arrows, either on both sides, left or right.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-expand-background
attribute.description: Defines whether the background should be painted under the arrows as well.

attribute.name: colspan
attribute.description: The number of columns wich are used by the item within a table.

attribute.name: rowspan
attribute.description: The number of rows wich are used by the item within a table.

attribute.name: view-type-left-x-offset
attribute.description: The number of pixels the left border of the view-type is shifted to the right (inside), negative values move the left border to the left (outside).

attribute.name: view-type-right-x-offset
attribute.description: The number of pixels the right border of the view-type is shifted to the left (inside), negative values move the right border to the right (outside).

attribute.name: view-type-top-y-offset
attribute.description: The number of pixels the top border of the view-type is shifted downwards, negative values move the top border to the upwards.

attribute.name: icon-inactive
attribute.appliesTo: IconItem, ChoiceItem, ChoiceGroup item, List item
attribute.description: Can be used to deactivate a specific ChoiceGroup/List item permanently. This can be useful to integrate explanations, headings etc into an ChoiceGroup/List.

attribute.name: show-dismiss-command
attribute.description: Can be used to deactivate the default Alert.DISMISS command for Alerts that don't have an Alert.FOREVER timeout.

attribute.name: skip-set-clip
attribute.description: Use this to deactivate the setting of the clipping for CustomItems. Usually the clip will be set for the exact content dimensions of the item. Deactivating it can be useful if you need to paint over the content area as well.

attribute.name: ticker-position
attribute.description: You can specify the position of the ticker on the screen.

attribute.name: title-position
attribute.description: You can specify the position of the title on the screen.

attribute.name: repaint-previous-screen
attribute.description: Specifies whether the previous screen should be repainted whenever the current screen changes, i.e. by user interaction. This makes sense when a translucent background is used for the current screen and the screen contains modifiable or selectable items.

attribute.name: menubar-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the menubar of the corresponding Screen.

attribute.name: scrollbar-position
attribute.description: (Note: not supported yet!) You can specify the position of the scrollbar on the screen after activating it with polish.useScrollBar.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-width
attribute.description: The width of the slider in pixels, is ignored when a slider-image is defined.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-color
attribute.description: The color of the slider, is ignored when a slider-image is defined.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-image
attribute.description: The URL of image used for the slider.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-image-repeat
attribute.description: Either "true" or "false". When "true" is given, the slider image is repeated vertically, if necessary.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-mode
attribute.description: The mode of the slider, either "area", "item" or "page". In the "area" mode the slider represents the position of the current selection relative to the complete width and height. In the "item" mode the index of the currently selected item is taken into account relative to the number of items. In the "page" mode the height of the currently visible area will be set relative to the complete height of the screen. The default mode is "page".

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-up-image
attribute.description: The image used for signaling that the user can scroll upwards. By default nothing is painted.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-down-image
attribute.description: The image used for signaling that the user can scroll downwards. By default nothing is painted.

attribute.name: scrollbar-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the scrollbar of the corresponding Screen.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-roundtrip
attribute.description: Determines whether the user can continue with the first ChoiceGroup item when she reaches the last item.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-arrow-padding
attribute.description: Sets the horizontal padding between the arrows of the exclusive view type. This overrides the default-horizontal-padding and makes only sense when the arrows are placed on either the left or the right side.

attribute.name: gauge-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed for the animation in pixels per cycle when the infinitive Gauge is in CONTINUOUS_RUNNING mode.

attribute.name: gauge-animation-mode
attribute.description: The mode for the animation in pixels per cycle when the infinitive Gauge is in CONTINUOUS_RUNNING mode. In the default "leftright" mode the image is running from the left to the right, in the "backandforth" mode the image is moved from the left to the right and back again. This makes only sense if you specify a gauge-image.

attribute.name: gauge-inactive-image
attribute.description: The image that is used to visualize inactive gauge values. By default such values are not drawn.

attribute.name: include-label
attribute.description: Usually the label of an item is rendered separately of the item's content. You can expand the background and border over the label as well using this attribute.

attribute.name: horizontalview-arrow-color
attribute.description: The color of the arrows.

attribute.name: horizontalview-right-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the right arrow image.

attribute.name: horizontalview-left-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the left horizontal-choice image.

attribute.name: horizontalview-arrow-position
attribute.description: The position of the arrows, either on both sides, left or right. The special value none can be used for deactivating the arrows completely.

attribute.name: horizontalview-expand-background
attribute.description: Defines whether the background should be painted under the arrows as well. When you set this to false, the include-label attribute will be ignored.

attribute.name: horizontalview-roundtrip
attribute.description: Determines whether the user can continue at the first ChoiceGroup item when he reaches the last item.

attribute.name: horizontalview-arrow-padding
attribute.description: Sets the horizontal padding between the arrows of the horizontal view type. This overrides the default-horizontal-padding and makes only sense when the arrows are placed on either the left or the right side.

attribute.name: horizontalview-scroll-mode
attribute.description: Enables or disables the smooth scrolling mode within the horizontal view-type.

attribute.name: separate-menu
attribute.description: Ensures that the menu is painted at the bottom of the screen without using the margins of the screen. You can apply the screen margins to the menubar as well by setting the "separate-menubar" property to "true".

attribute.name: choicetextfield-containerstyle
attribute.description: Defines the style for the menu that contains the possible matches for the curent user input.

attribute.name: choicetextfield-choicestyle
attribute.description: Defines the style for single possible matches of the curent user input.

attribute.name: min-height
attribute.description: The minimum content height of an item. Note that in conformance with the web CSS standard for percentage values the available width is being used. If you would like to use the available height for measurements, please set the preprocessing variable 'polish.Item.useHeightInsteadOfWidth' to 'true'.

attribute.name: max-height
attribute.description: The maximum content height of an item. Note that in conformance with the web CSS standard for percentage values the available width is being used. If you would like to use the available height for measurements, please set the preprocessing variable 'polish.Item.useHeightInsteadOfWidth' to 'true'.

attribute.name: command-child-indicator
attribute.description: The image used for a command to indicate that it has subcommands.

attribute.name: command-child-indicator-color
attribute.description: The color for the drawn arrow that is used for a command to indicate that it has subcommands. Only used when the "command-child-indicator" CSS attribute is not set.

attribute.name: command-child-indicator-width
attribute.description: The width of the drawn arrow that is used for a command to indicate that it has subcommands. Only used when the "command-child-indicator" CSS attribute is not set.

attribute.name: command-child-indicator-height
attribute.description: The height of the drawn arrow that is used for a command to indicate that it has subcommands. Only used when the "command-child-indicator" CSS attribute is not set.

attribute.name: text-wrap
attribute.description: Determines wether the text should be wrapped or whether it should be kept on a single line, even when it is larger than the available width.

attribute.name: gauge-button-image
attribute.description: Uses the specified image as the button and draws it at the current value positition of the gauge.

attribute.name: gauge-slider-image
attribute.description: Uses the specified image as the slider, this is useful in combination with the gauge-button-image capability.

attribute.name: background-bottom
attribute.description: The bottom border of the background for this screen. Usually the background reaches to the very bottom of the screen which includes the menubar. By setting background-bottom: menubar; this background only reaches to the menubar.

attribute.name: backgroundrange-bottom
attribute.description: The bottom border of the background for this screen. Usually the background reaches to the very bottom of the screen which includes the menubar. By setting background-bottom: menubar; this background only reaches to the menubar.

attribute.name: background-top
attribute.description: The top border of the background for this screen. Usually the background reaches from the very top of the screen which includes the title. By setting background-top: title; this background starts after the title.

attribute.name: backgroundrange-top
attribute.description: The top border of the background for this screen. Usually the background reaches from the very top of the screen which includes the title. By setting background-top: title; this background starts after the title.

attribute.name: tabbar-left-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the image used for indicating that there are tabs left of the current selection available.

attribute.name: tabbar-right-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the image used for indicating that there are tabs right of the current selection available.

attribute.name: tabbar-arrow-y-offset
attribute.description: The vertical adjustment for the scrolling indicator arrows. Positive values move the indicators torwards the bottom.

attribute.name: tabbar-arrow-x-offset
attribute.description: The horizontal adjustment for the scrolling indicator arrows. Positive values move the indicators torwards the right.

attribute.name: tabbar-roundtrip
attribute.description: Defines whether the user starts at the first tab after passing the last tab. By default the user cannot pass neither the first nor the last tab.

attribute.name: horizontalview-arrows-image
attribute.description: The URL of the combined arrows image which shows both arrows to the left and to the right.

attribute.name: image-y-offset
attribute.description: The y offset for the image of an image item, negative values push the image upwards.

attribute.name: image-height
attribute.description: The assumed height for the image of an image item.

attribute.name: text-mirror-color
attribute.description: The color for the vertically mirrored text, defaults to the given font-color.

attribute.name: text-mirror-padding
attribute.description: The gap between the text and the mirror-shadow, defaults to 0.

attribute.name: text-mirror-steps
attribute.description: The number of pixels until the mirror-shadow fades away, defaults to the given font's height.

attribute.name: text-mirror-start-translucency
attribute.description: The opaqueness of the first row of the shadow in percent: between 0 (fully transparent) and 100 (fully opaque)

attribute.name: text-mirror-end-translucency
attribute.description: The opaqueness of the last row of the shadow in percent: between 0 (fully transparent) and 100 (fully opaque)

attribute.name: clock-format
attribute.description: The time format for the DigitalClockItem with the following identifiers: hh=hours, mm=minutes, ss=seconds, am|pm=for using the 12 hour system instead of the 24 hour one. Examples: "hh:mm am", "hh/mm/ss".

attribute.name: text-drop-shadow-size
attribute.description: The size of the shadow for every direction.

attribute.name: text-drop-shadow-offsetx
attribute.description: The x offset of the shadow. Negative values move the shadow inside.

attribute.name: text-drop-shadow-offsety
attribute.description: The y offset of the shadow. Negative values move the shadow inside.

attribute.name: text-drop-shadow-inner-color
attribute.description: The color of the inner shadow. The color must not be fully opaque!

attribute.name: text-drop-shadow-outer-color
attribute.description: The color of the outer shadow, which must be less opaque than the start-color and the difference between them should be at least size.

attribute.name: text-alien-glow-inner-color
attribute.description: The inner part color of the glow.

attribute.name: text-alien-glow-outer-color
attribute.description: The outer part color of the glow.

attribute.name: text-fade-in-color
attribute.description: The color of the text if it is faded in.

attribute.name: text-fade-out-color
attribute.description: The color of the text if it is faded out.

attribute.name: text-fade-delay
attribute.description: The delay in animation steps before the animation starts.

attribute.name: text-fade-duration-in
attribute.description: The time for which the text stays faded in, messured in animation steps.

attribute.name: text-fade-duration-out
attribute.description: The time for which the text stays faded out, messured in animation steps.

attribute.name: text-fade-steps
attribute.description: The time for which the fade-effect lasts, messured in animation steps.

attribute.name: text-fade-mode
attribute.description: The fade mode can be fadein, fadeout or loop.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-inner-color
attribute.description: The inner part color of the glow.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-outer-out-color
attribute.description: The outer part color of the glow, if the state is faded out.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-outer-in-color
attribute.description: The outer part color of the glow, if the state is faded in.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-delay
attribute.description: The delay (in steps) before the animation starts.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-duration-in
attribute.description: The time (in steps), which the text stays faded in.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-duration-out
attribute.description: The time (in steps), which the text stays faded out.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-steps
attribute.description: The time (in steps), which the fade-effect lasts.

attribute.name: text-fading-alien-glow-mode
attribute.description: The fade mode can be fadein, fadeout or loop.

attribute.name: before
attribute.description: The URL of the image that should be shown before the item in question.

attribute.name: after
attribute.description: The URL of the image that should be shown after the item in question.

attribute.name: text-rotate-angle
attribute.description: The angle in degrees between 0 and 360 by which the text should be rotated.

attribute.name: text-rotating-start-angle
attribute.description: The angle in degrees between 0 and 360 at which the text rotation animation is started.

attribute.name: text-rotating-end-angle
attribute.description: The angle in degrees between 0 and 360 at which the text rotation animation is ended.

attribute.name: text-rotating-steps
attribute.description: The steps in degrees by which the rotation is increased in each animation phase.

attribute.name: carrouselview-remove-text
attribute.description: Text like labels are shown for the focused item only by default. Set carrouselview-remove-text to false for showing the text for every item.

attribute.name: customitem-inactive
attribute.description: Can be used to deactivate a specific CustomItem permanently. Use this for creating a custom item that cannot be selected by the user.

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-startvalue
attribute.description: The lowest possible value of this gauge.

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-section1-start
attribute.description: The value at which the first section starts, default is the startvalue (0).

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-section2-start
attribute.description: The value at which the first section starts, default is the value range divided by 3.

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-section3-start
attribute.description: The value at which the first section starts, default is the value range multiplied by 2/3.

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-section1-color
attribute.description: The color of the first section, is invisible by default

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-section2-color
attribute.description: The color of the second section, is invisible by default

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-section3-color
attribute.description: The color of the third section, is invisible by default

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-clockface-color
attribute.description: The color of the clockface of the tachometer

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-inner-color
attribute.description: The inner color of the tachometer

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-needle-color
attribute.description: The color of the tachometer needle.

attribute.name: gauge-tachometer-factor
attribute.description: An integer factor by which all given values are divided for simulating floating point. A factor of 10 and a value of 14 will result in a displayed value of 1.4, for example.

attribute.name: inherit
attribute.description: Defines if a style that extends this style should inherit all attributes.

attribute.name: chart-vertical-bars-shadow-color
attribute.description: The color of the shadow for the bars. By default no shadows are painted.

attribute.name: gauge-recline-width
attribute.description: The width of the rects.

attribute.name: gauge-recline-height
attribute.description: The height of the rects.

attribute.name: gauge-recline-number
attribute.description: The number of rects.

attribute.name: gauge-recline-selectedcolor
attribute.description: The color of a selected rect.

attribute.name: gauge-recline-unselectedcolor
attribute.description: The number of an unselected rects.

attribute.name: fade-screen-change-animation-steps
attribute.description: Number of animation steps.

attribute.name: left-screen-change-animation-move-previous
attribute.description: Set to true for moving the previous screen along with the animation.

attribute.name: right-screen-change-animation-move-previous
attribute.description: Set to true for moving the previous screen along with the animation.

attribute.name: top-screen-change-animation-move-previous
attribute.description: Set to true for moving the previous screen along with the animation.

attribute.name: bottom-screen-change-animation-move-previous
attribute.description: Set to true for moving the previous screen along with the animation.

attribute.name: diagonal-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The constant speed of the animation - by default the animation uses a somewhat quadratic de-acceleration.

attribute.name: diagonal-screen-change-animation-move-previous
attribute.description: Set to true for moving the previous screen along with the animation.

attribute.name: diagonal-screen-change-animation-background-color
attribute.description: The background color of the animation when the previous screen should also be moved.

attribute.name: fadeOutFadeIn-screen-change-animation-steps
attribute.description: The number of steps of the animation.

attribute.name: fadeOutFadeIn-screen-change-animation-background-color
attribute.description: The background color of the animation.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: The width of an item either in pixels or in percent.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: The height of the content of an item either in pixels or in percent. Note that in conformance with the web CSS standard for percentage values the available width is being used. If you would like to use the available height for measurements, please set the preprocessing variable 'polish.Item.useHeightInsteadOfWidth' to 'true'.

attribute.name: x
attribute.description: The horizontal position of an item either in pixels or in percent relative to it's parent.

attribute.name: y
attribute.description: The vertical position of an item either in pixels or in percent relative to it's parent.

attribute.name: fade-in-transparency-start
attribute.description: The transparency that is used for the first animation step.

attribute.name: fade-in-transparency-end
attribute.description: The transparency that is used for the last animation step.

attribute.name: fade-in-transparency-delta
attribute.description: The amount by which the transparency is increased in each animation step.

attribute.name: fade-in-next-style
attribute.description: The style that should be automatically set when the fade-in animation has been finished.

attribute.name: fade-out-transparency-start
attribute.description: The transparency that is used for the first animation step.

attribute.name: fade-out-transparency-end
attribute.description: The transparency that is used for the last animation step.

attribute.name: fade-out-transparency-delta
attribute.description: The amount by which the transparency is decreased in each animation step.

attribute.name: rightcommand-style
attribute.description: The style for the command shown on the right side of the menubar. Can only be used when the extended menubar is enabled.

attribute.name: leftcommand-style
attribute.description: The style for the command shown on the left side of the menubar. can only be used when the extended menubar is enabled.

attribute.name: middlecommand-style
attribute.description: The style for the (item) command shown in the middle of the menubar. Can only be used when the extended menubar is enabled.

attribute.name: menu-style
attribute.description: The style for the commands within the options command of the menubar. Can only be used when the extended menubar is enabled.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-scale
attribute.description: The factor by which the non-focused elements should be scaled. By default they are scaled to 50% of their original size.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-remove-text
attribute.description: Removes the text of the non-focused elements if set to true.

attribute.name: filter-position
attribute.description: Position of the textfield used to filter the results.

attribute.name: filter-style
attribute.description: The style for the filter textfield within a FilteredList.

attribute.name: popup-style
attribute.description: The style for the FilteredList that is shown when the user openes a FilteredChoiceGroup.

attribute.name: sizeincreaseview-amount
attribute.description: The percentual amount to increase the item.

attribute.name: sizeincreaseview-top
attribute.description: Declares if the item should build up from the top or from the bottom.

attribute.name: sizedecreaseview-amount
attribute.description: The percentual amount to decrease the item.

attribute.name: sizedecreaseview-top
attribute.description: Declares if the item should build down from the top or from the bottom.

attribute.name: tabbar-style
attribute.description: The style for the tabbar at the top of a TabbedList or TabbedForm.

attribute.name: tabbar-position
attribute.description: The position of the tabbar within a TabbedList.

attribute.name: gauge-is-percent
attribute.description: Specifies if the value within the gauge should be shown as a percent value.

attribute.name: text-wrap-animate
attribute.description: You can deactivate animations for texts that should not be wrapped and which are too long for a single line.

attribute.name: treeitem-closed-indicator
attribute.description: An image indicating the closed state of a tree node.

attribute.name: treeitem-opened-indicator
attribute.description: An image indicating the opened state of a tree node.

attribute.name: predictive-containerstyle
attribute.description: Defines the style for the menu that contains the possible matches for the current user input.

attribute.name: predictive-choicestyle
attribute.description: Defines the style for single possible matches of the curent user input.

attribute.name: show-scrollbar
attribute.description: Can be used to deactivate the scrollbar for a specific screen. You need to activate scrollbar usage with polish.useScrollBar=true before using this CSS attribute.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-scale-end
attribute.description: The factor by which the outer most non-focused elements should be scaled. By default they are scaled to 50% of their original size.

attribute.name: always-include
attribute.description: Defines if a style should always be included, even if not used. This is useful for programmatically accessed and for HTML browser styles.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-spheres-color
attribute.description: The color of the normal spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-spheres-highlight-color
attribute.description: The color of the hightlighted spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-spheres-count
attribute.description: The count of all spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-spheres-highlight-count
attribute.description: The count of the highlighted spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-spheres-width
attribute.description: The width of the spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-spheres-color
attribute.description: The color of the normal spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-spheres-highlight-color
attribute.description: The color of the hightlighted spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-spheres-count
attribute.description: The count of all spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-spheres-highlight-count
attribute.description: The count of the highlighted spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-spheres-width
attribute.description: The width of the spheres.

attribute.name: icon-image-align-next
attribute.description: Specifies if a horizontal aligned image should be painted at the border (=default) or next to the content when the item has an expand layout.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-spheres-highlight-center-color
attribute.description: The color of the centered hightlighted spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-spheres-highlight-center-color
attribute.description: The color of the centered hightlighted spheres.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-icons-image
attribute.description: The image for the normal icons.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-icons-highlight-image
attribute.description: The image for the hightlighted icons.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-icons-count
attribute.description: The count of all icons.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-icons-highlight-count
attribute.description: The count of the highlighted icons.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-icons-highlight-center-image
attribute.description: The image of the centered hightlighted icons.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-icons-image
attribute.description: The image for the normal icons.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-icons-highlight-image
attribute.description: The image for the hightlighted icons.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-icons-count
attribute.description: The count of all icons.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-icons-highlight-count
attribute.description: The count of the highlighted icons.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-icons-highlight-center-image
attribute.description: The image of the centered hightlighted icons.

attribute.name: predictive-choice-orientation
attribute.description: Sets the orientation of a shadow for the shadow font-effect.

attribute.name: icon-padding
attribute.description: The padding between the image and the text of an icon.

attribute.name: predictive-type
attribute.description: Sets the type of the predictive field.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-spheres-interval
attribute.description: The interval of the animation in miliseconds.

attribute.name: gauge-cycling-icons-interval
attribute.description: The interval of the animation in miliseconds.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-spheres-interval
attribute.description: The interval of the animation in miliseconds.

attribute.name: gauge-horizontal-icons-interval
attribute.description: The interval of the animation in miliseconds.

attribute.name: pressed-style
attribute.description: The style which indicates that an item is being pressed, usually applied with a [style-name]:pressed construct.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-scale-start
attribute.description: The factor by which the non-focused elements should be scaled. By default they are scaled to 50% of their original size.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-alpha-start
attribute.description: The translucency between 0 and 255 for items directly next to the central item of the view. Higher values indicate more opaqueness, lower ones make it more translucent.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-alpha-end
attribute.description: The translucency between 0 and 255 for items at the outer edges of the view. Higher values indicate more opaqueness, lower ones make it more translucent.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-transparency
attribute.description: Sets transparency to true or false.

attribute.name: content-style
attribute.description: The style for the text of an alert.

attribute.name: text-flash-interval
attribute.description: The interval in milliseconds for the flashing.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-max-visible
attribute.description: the maximum number of visible items, set to 0 for displaying all items.

attribute.name: scrollbar-fadeout
attribute.description: Defines if the scrollbar should automatically fade out. Additionally you have to define the opacity attribute.

attribute.name: complete-border
attribute.description: A border reference from the borders section. The border includes the label of the item and is independent of the item's normal border.

attribute.name: complete-background-padding
attribute.description: The padding that is added to the complete-background and/or complete-border. Note that this does not change the size of the item, so you might need to adapt margins or normal paddings for your design.

attribute.name: slideview-duration
attribute.description: The maximum time in milliseconds until the slided item will be fully visible.

attribute.name: slideview-direction
attribute.description: The direction into which the item will be slided.

attribute.name: view-type-sequential-traversal
attribute.description: Defines if the cells of a table can only be traversered in sequential order. By default you can move to the next row by pressing down - when the sequential-traversal is enabled pressing down will move the focus to the next item instead. Only applicable when the columns attribute is being used.

attribute.name: expand-items
attribute.description: Expands the items within a screen or container to the width of the largest item - in contrast to the expand layout not the full available width is being used.

attribute.name: popup-roundtrip
attribute.description: Allows to cycle through all items of a POPUP ChoiceGroup. When the user has arrieved at the last item and presses DOWN the focus will jump to the first item instead of closing the POPUP ChoiceGroup.

attribute.name: visible
attribute.description: Toggles the visibility of an item. When an item is invisible, it will not occupy any space.

attribute.name: change-styles
attribute.description: Changes the styles of child items. Use the notation '[style1]>[style2]', e.g. visible>invisible for defining the style names.

attribute.name: screen-orientation-change-animation
attribute.description: Defines the animation that should be shown when the screen orientation is changed. Orientation changes need to be allowed by setting the preprocessing variable ScreenOrientationCanChangeManually to true.

attribute.name: leftframe-style
attribute.description: The style for the left frame of a FramedForm.

attribute.name: rightframe-style
attribute.description: The style for the right frame of a FramedForm.

attribute.name: topframe-style
attribute.description: The style for the top frame of a FramedForm.

attribute.name: bottomframe-style
attribute.description: The style for bottom top frame of a FramedForm.

attribute.name: text-split-bottom-color
attribute.description: The color of the bottom part.

attribute.name: text-split-split-pos
attribute.description: The vertical split position in percent - 0%..100%.

attribute.name: focused-style-first
attribute.description: The focused style for the first item in an Screen, ChoiceGroup, List, Container.

attribute.name: focused-style-last
attribute.description: The focused style for the last item in an Screen, ChoiceGroup, List, Container.

attribute.name: table-line-color
attribute.description: The color of lines between cells.

attribute.name: table-line-stroke
attribute.description: The stroke style of lines between cells - invisible will remove lines between cells.

attribute.name: treeitem-node-style
attribute.description: The style for nodes in a TreeItem. You can use any Container related styles for nodes.

attribute.name: view-remove-text
attribute.description: Removes the text of the non-focused elements if set to true.

attribute.name: view-remove-text-position
attribute.description: The position of the text that is extracted from the currently focused item.

attribute.name: view-remove-text-style
attribute.description: The style for the removed text, this defaults to the font-settings of the focused item.

attribute.name: text-wrap-animation-direction
attribute.description: The direction of the animation when the text is too wide and wrapping is deactivated.

attribute.name: text-wrap-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation when the text is too wide and wrapping is deactivated.

attribute.name: tabbar-activetab-style
attribute.description: Style of the currently selected tab within a TabbedForm.

attribute.name: tabbar-inactivetab-style
attribute.description: Style of the unselected tabs within a TabbedForm.

attribute.name: table-selected-background
attribute.description: The background for selected cells of a table.

attribute.name: table-selected-row-background
attribute.description: The background for selected rows of a table.

attribute.name: table-selected-column-background
attribute.description: The background for selected columns of a table.

attribute.name: x-adjust
attribute.description: The horizontal position adjustment of an item, use a negative value to move it to the left.

attribute.name: y-adjust
attribute.description: The vertical position adjustment of an item, use a negative value to move it to the top.

attribute.name: content-x-adjust
attribute.description: The horizontal position adjustment of an item's content, use a negative value to move it to the left.

attribute.name: content-y-adjust
attribute.description: The vertical position adjustment of an item's content, use a negative value to move it to the top.

attribute.name: background-width
attribute.description: The width of the background in pixel or percent, if it should differ from the the item's width.

attribute.name: background-height
attribute.description: The height of the background in pixel or percent, if it should differ from the the item's width.

attribute.name: background-anchor
attribute.description: The orientation of the background in case either it's width or height is different from the item's dimensions.

attribute.name: filter
attribute.description: Defines a filter for the specified UI element.

attribute.name: filter-opacity
attribute.description: The opacity of the element between 0 (invisible) up to 100% or 255 (fully opaque).

attribute.name: filter-grayscale-grade
attribute.description: The grayscale of the element between 0% (fully colored) up to 100% (complete grayscale).

attribute.name: scroll-background
attribute.description: Specifies if the background should be expanded to the container of the screen.

attribute.name: gray-offset
attribute.description: the offset to lighten up the grayscaling

attribute.name: filter-blur-grade
attribute.description: The blur of the element between 0% (not blurred) up to 100% (strongly blurred).

attribute.name: filter-scale-grade
attribute.description: The scaling of the element.

attribute.name: content-background
attribute.description: The background of the content area of a screen. This needs to be a reference to a background defined in the backgrounds section.

attribute.name: content-border
attribute.description: The border of the content area of a screen. This needs to be a reference to a border defined in the borders section.

attribute.name: content-bgborder
attribute.description: The border of the content area of a screen which is painted before the background. This needs to be a reference to a border defined in the borders section.

attribute.name: gauge-background-color
attribute.description: the background color of the gauge progress bar

attribute.name: bgborder
attribute.description: The border of an item which is painted before the background. This needs to be a reference to a border defined in the borders section.

attribute.name: gauge-rotating-circles-start-color
attribute.description: The color of the biggest circle

attribute.name: gauge-rotating-circles-end-color
attribute.description: The color of the smallest circle

attribute.name: horizontalview-align-heights
attribute.description: Specifies if all items should have the same height as the highest item in the group. You can exclude an item from aligning by setting its layout to vertical-shrink.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-background
attribute.description: The background that renders the slider instead of the default monocolored rectangular slider.

attribute.name: focus-all
attribute.description: Focusses all children items with their specific :hover style when the parent container is focused, even when those items are not interactive.

attribute.name: content-visible
attribute.description: Activates or deactives the visibility of the item's contents. When the content is not visible, only the label as well as before and after attributes are visible.

attribute.name: separate-title
attribute.description: Ensures that the title is painted separately from the screen's content. This attribute makes only sense when combining it with the repaint-previous-screen CSS attribute.

attribute.name: content-background-width
attribute.description: The width of the content-background in pixel or percent, if it should differ from the the item's content width.

attribute.name: content-background-height
attribute.description: The height of the content-background in pixel or percent, if it should differ from the the item's content width.

attribute.name: content-background-anchor
attribute.description: The orientation of the content-background in case either it's width or height is different from the item's content dimensions.

attribute.name: subtitle-position
attribute.description: You can specify the position of the subtitle on the screen. Since a TabbedForm uses the subtitle element for rendering the tabbar, you can also use this for positioning a tabbar at the botom.

attribute.name: gauge-images-sources
attribute.description: The images to use in a ImagesGaugeView, separated by a comma (e.g. 1.png,2.png)

attribute.name: gauge-images-interval
attribute.description: The interval to change the images in a ImagesGaugeView

attribute.name: max-lines
attribute.description: the maximum lines to show in a stringitem

attribute.name: focus-all-style
attribute.description: the style to style the real focused item

attribute.name: text-cycling-interval
attribute.description: The time interval that has to pass before the next text chunk is shown.

attribute.name: icon-filter
attribute.description: Specifies an RGB filter for the image of an icon item

attribute.name: align-content-x
attribute.description: The horizontal start position for the content either in pixels or in percent.

attribute.name: force-lines
attribute.description: forces the StringItem to display the lines stated in max-lines

attribute.name: bottomframe-height
attribute.description: forces the bottomframe to the specified height

attribute.name: topframe-height
attribute.description: forces the toprame to the specified height

attribute.name: content-expand
attribute.description: expand the drawn content area to the bottom

attribute.name: time-arrow-up
attribute.description: A square background that can be clicked for increasing the hour or minute setting of a TimeEntryItem. Use a reference from the backgrounds section.

attribute.name: time-arrow-down
attribute.description: A square background that can be clicked for decreasing the hour or minute setting of a TimeEntryItem. Use a reference from the backgrounds section.

attribute.name: time-arrow-width
attribute.description: The width of the arrows for altering the time with pointer events, which defaults to the width of '99' in the time item's font.

attribute.name: align-heights
attribute.description: Specifies if all items should have the same height as the highest item in the respective row. You can exclude an item from aligning by setting its layout to vertical-shrink.

attribute.name: suppress-indicator
attribute.description: suppresses the indicator of a CommandItem

attribute.name: inline-label
attribute.description: Inlines the label of an item, so that the content will be on the same row (or at least start on the same row). The label can only occupy 90% or less of the available width, otherwise this setting is ignored.

attribute.name: item-transition
attribute.description: Defines a transition for an item, e.g. within the item screen-change-animation.

attribute.name: item-screen-change-animation-container-transition
attribute.description: The transition for the container

attribute.name: title-menu
attribute.description: A flag to show the menubar as the title

attribute.name: vertical-scroll-interval
attribute.description: The interval to show and scroll lines in the VerticalScrollTextEffect

attribute.name: text-layout
attribute.description: The layout of the text, this is useful in combination with min-width or max-width and an item layout that differs from the desired text layout.

attribute.name: checked-style
attribute.description: The style for a checked element of a ChoiceGroup. You should also define a corresponding focused-style.

attribute.name: ticker-direction
attribute.description: The direction of the ticker - this defaults to 'left' meaning moving from right to left.

attribute.name: scroll-up-background
attribute.description: A background that is painted over the normal background when the container can scroll up/is scrolled down. Use a reference from the backgrounds section.

attribute.name: scroll-down-background
attribute.description: A background that is painted over the normal background when the container can scroll down. Use a reference from the backgrounds section.

attribute.name: overlay-background
attribute.description: A background that is painted between the previous screen and the current screen. This makes only sense in combination with repaint-previous-screen.

attribute.name: show-delay
attribute.description: Delays a show notification for the included items, this is typically used in combination with CSS animations that are triggered on show.

attribute.name: visited-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for an item that has been visited - meaning that it's default command has been triggered. This is usually applied with a [style-name]:visited style definition.

attribute.name: move-scroll-backgrounds
attribute.description: Deactivate the movement for scroll-up- and scroll-down-backgrounds that have been defined within the screens style.

attribute.name: landscape-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for an item in landscape mode (when the screen is more wide than high).

attribute.name: portrait-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for an item in portrait mode (when the screen is more high than wide).

attribute.name: text-visible
attribute.description: You can turn off the text rendering completely by setting text-visible to false.

attribute.name: max-lines-appendix
attribute.description: Defines the appendix that is added at the end of the text if it should be longer than max-lines. To be used in conjunction with max-lines.

attribute.name: menu-item-style
attribute.description: The default style for commands shown within the options menu.

attribute.name: scrollbar-slider-minimum-height
attribute.description: The minimum height to be used for the slider of a scrollbar

attribute.name: vertical-scroll-max-lines
attribute.description: The maximum lines to use for the verticalscrolltexteffect

attribute.name: horizontalview-distribution
attribute.description: Set to equal for giving each item the same available space.

attribute.name: calendar-day-style
attribute.description: The style of a normal day within an CalendarItem.

attribute.name: calendar-weekday-style
attribute.description: The style of the weekday headings within an CalendarItem.

attribute.name: calendar-day-inactive-style
attribute.description: The style for days of the preceding or following month within an CalendarItem.

attribute.name: calendar-current-day-style
attribute.description: The style of the currently selected day within an CalendarItem.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-arrow-color-pressed
attribute.description: The color of the currently pressed arrow.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-right-arrow-pressed
attribute.description: The URL of the right arrow image when it is pressed.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-left-arrow-pressed
attribute.description: The URL of the left arrow image when it is pressed.

attribute.name: filter-scale-crop
attribute.description: Specifies if the resulting scaled image should be cropped to the original image dimensions. WARNING: May cause OutOfMemory errors when set to false! Use at your own risk.

attribute.name: icon-filter-layout
attribute.description: Specifies the position of the icon filter result in case a size change is involved.

attribute.name: commands-style
attribute.description: The style for the commands container of an item that is shown when an item is pressed/hold for a long time and when the preprocesing variable polish.Item.ShowCommandsOnHold is activated.

attribute.name: child-style
attribute.description: The style for the items of a Container that don't have a style assigned.

attribute.name: child-style-first
attribute.description: The style for the first item of a Container in case that doesn't have a style assigned. Can be used only in conjunction with the child-style CSS attribute.

attribute.name: child-style-last
attribute.description: The style for the last item of a Container in case that doesn't have a style assigned. Can be used only in conjunction with the child-style CSS attribute.

attribute.name: filter-rotation-angle
attribute.description: The angle of rotation (in degrees).

attribute.name: fisheyeview-place-label-at-top
attribute.description: Allows to place the label on top of the view. By default the label is rendered below the icons. This is only applicable when fisheyeview-remove-text is true.

attribute.name: box-align
attribute.description: Allows to the radio- or checkbox of a choice element on the right side.

attribute.name: text-filter
attribute.description: Specifies an RGB filter for the text of an StringItem or one of its subclasses

attribute.name: text-filter-layout
attribute.description: Specifies the position of the text filter result in case a size change is involved.

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-image
attribute.description: The image for the needle

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-background-image
attribute.description: The image for the background of the instrument

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-x
attribute.description: The X coordinate of the needle center (with respect to the background).

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-y
attribute.description: The Y coordinate of the needle center (with respect to the background)

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-center-x
attribute.description: The X coordinate of the needle rotation center (with respect to the upper-left corner of the needle)

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-center-y
attribute.description: The Y coordinate of the needle rotation center (with respect to the upper-left corner of the needle)

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-start-angle
attribute.description: The angle corresponding to the lowest value of the gauge.

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-end-angle
attribute.description: The angle corresponding to the highest value of the gauge.

attribute.name: needle-filter
attribute.description: Specifies an RGB filter for the image of the needle

attribute.name: face-filter
attribute.description: Specifies an RGB filter for the image of the clock face

attribute.name: drop-shadow-size
attribute.description: The size of the shadow for every direction.

attribute.name: drop-shadow-offsetx
attribute.description: The x offset of the shadow. Negative values move the shadow to the left.

attribute.name: drop-shadow-offsety
attribute.description: The y offset of the shadow. Negative values move the shadow to the top.

attribute.name: drop-shadow-inner-color
attribute.description: The color of the inner shadow. The color must not be fully opaque!

attribute.name: drop-shadow-outer-color
attribute.description: The color of the outer shadow, which must be less opaque than the start-color and the difference between them should be at least size.

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-shadow-image
attribute.description: The image for the shadow of the needle

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-shadow-center-x
attribute.description: The X coordinate of the needle shadow rotation center.

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-shadow-center-y
attribute.description: The Y coordinate of the needle shadow rotation center.

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-shadow-offset-x
attribute.description: The horizontal offset of the shadow, in relation to the needle image.

attribute.name: gauge-clock-instrument-needle-shadow-offset-y
attribute.description: The vertical offset of the shadow, in relation to the needle image.

attribute.name: tabbedpane-tabbar-position
attribute.description: Position of the tabs within a TabbedPane.

attribute.name: min-item-width
attribute.description: The minimum complete width of an item.

attribute.name: max-item-width
attribute.description: The maximum complete width of an item.

attribute.name: min-item-height
attribute.description: The minimum complete height of an item. Note that in conformance with the web CSS standard for percentage values the available width is being used. If you would like to use the available height for measurements, please set the preprocessing variable 'polish.Item.useHeightInsteadOfWidth' to 'true'.

attribute.name: max-item-height
attribute.description: The maximum complete height of an item. Note that in conformance with the web CSS standard for percentage values the available width is being used. If you would like to use the available height for measurements, please set the preprocessing variable 'polish.Item.useHeightInsteadOfWidth' to 'true'.

attribute.name: fisheyeview-text-style
attribute.description: Style for the text that is displayed in fisheyeview containers or choicegroups - only used when fisheyeview-remove-text is also true.

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-width
attribute.description: The width of the rects.

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-height
attribute.description: The height of the rects.

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-number
attribute.description: The number of scanline rects .

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-selectedcolor
attribute.description: The color of a selected rect.

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-unselectedcolor
attribute.description: The color of an unselected rect.

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-image-left
attribute.description: Image url for the left part of the scanning element

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-image-middle
attribute.description: Image url for the middle part of the scanning element

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-image-right
attribute.description: Image url for the right part of the scanning element

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-background-image-left
attribute.description: Image url for the left part of the background

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-background-image-middle
attribute.description: Image url for the middle part of the background

attribute.name: gauge-scanline-background-image-right
attribute.description: Image url for the right part of the background

attribute.name: calendar-show-mode
attribute.description: Sets the mode for visualizing the current month and year

attribute.name: table-row-height
attribute.description: The height of a row within a table item, e.g. table-row-height: 10%; The row-height is calculated in relation to the available height.

attribute.name: view-type-auto-traversal
attribute.description: Allows autotraversel for a container view.

attribute.name: filter-alpha-image
attribute.description: The alpha map for the AlphaRgbFilter

attribute.name: border-adjust
attribute.description: Change the border width, height and position by specifying border-adjust. A positive value moves the border to the right and bottom.

attribute.name: max-image-height
attribute.description: The maximum height of an image. If the image exceeds the maximum height, it will be scaled down accordingly.

attribute.name: max-image-width
attribute.description: The maximum width of an image. If the image exceeds the maximum width it will be scaled down accordingly. Example: max-image-width: 100%; ensures that the image will fit within the available space.

attribute.name: filter-direct
attribute.description: Defines wether the the RgbFilters should be applied directly to the RgbImage input

attribute.name: ignore-leading
attribute.description: Defines whether the StringItem should draw the text without the leading of the font in the first line on BlackBerry devices.

attribute.name: press-all
attribute.description: Presses all children items with their specific :pressed style when the parent container is pressed even when those items are not interactive.

attribute.name: bounce
attribute.description: Allows to switch on the bouncing drag effect for a specific container. If you want to switch off bouncing for all containers set the preprocessing variable "polish.Container.ScrollBounce" to "false".

attribute.name: tabbedview-icon
attribute.description: The URL of the icon image that represents a tab

attribute.name: tabbedview-icon-hover
attribute.description: The URL of the icon for the currently focused tab

attribute.name: tabbedview-roundtrip
attribute.description: Allows to start at the first tab when being in the last tap and pressing right (or going from the first to the last tab).

attribute.name: horizontalview-arrow-left
attribute.description: The URL of the image that displays a right image.

attribute.name: horizontalview-arrow-right
attribute.description: The URL of the image that displays a left image.

attribute.name: tabbedview-tabbar-position
attribute.description: The position of the tabs.

attribute.name: tabbedview-tabbar-style
attribute.description: The style for the container that includes the tabs.

attribute.name: tabbedview-tab-style
attribute.description: The style for a single tab.

attribute.name: calendar-day-invalid-style
attribute.description: The style for days of the current month that are outside of the specified valid period within an CalendarItem.

attribute.name: vertical-doors-screen-change-animation-duration
attribute.description: The duration of the animation.

attribute.name: vertical-doors-screen-change-animation-direction
attribute.description: The direction of the animation.

attribute.name: vertical-doors-screen-change-animation-delay
attribute.description: The delay between the upper and the lower door of the animation.

attribute.name: color
attribute.description: A color attribute to be used for various needs and concerns
